text: Benjamin Ashworth Ramsbottom (18 April 1929 â€“ 14 January 2023) was a British pastor among the Strict Baptists. For over fifty years he was pastor of a church in Luton, Bedfordshire. He wrote many theological books and other publications. He was also the longest serving editor of the magazine Gospel Standard. BA Ramsbottom (as he was generally known) died on 14 January 2023, at the age of 93. ==References== Category:English theologians Category:Writers from Lancashire Category:evangelists Category:1929 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Place of death missing
title: Benjamin Ashworth Ramsbottom
